rajarata wishwa widyalaye palakayan sisun dadayam karaddi sisun samaga eeniya sama sakachcha pawathwu aacharya sangamaye ugathun muniwatha rakima tharam amana mugdha kriyawak thawath nathayi deshapalana wicharakayan pawasayi.me wana wita rajarata wishwa widyalaye sisun 3k athadanguwata gena athi athara thawath sisun 20kata wada wadi pramanayak athadanguwata ganimata polisiya soyamin siti.epamanak nowa aacharya sangamaye madihath wimen sisun ha upakulapathiwaraya athara athiwu ekagatha ahosi kala bawa niwedanaya kara shishya sanwidhanada thahanam kara atha.rajarata wishwa widyalaye shishyayan dina 200k thisse sisun 27 denekuta erehiwa panawa athi panthi thahanama iwath karannayi samakami lesa aragala karaddi nihadawa siti mema ugath aduran anunge adhyapana ayithiya wenuwen aragala kala sisun dangediyata yawanawa bala siti mema ugath aduran prashnaya wisada ganimata idak nomathikama nisama kisiyam aakarayakata samanya thathwaya ikmawa giya kriya margayakata awathirna wu sisun idiri pita paladagath madhyastha wesmunu galawi yaddith thama gaurawaya bida wateddith aarakshawa pilibandawa wyaja satan patayakata muwa wi nihadawa sitinne sabawinma thama padipathiwadikama raka ganimatada?ese nomathi nam thama madihathwima wishwasa kirima hethuwen sisun yalith dangediya wetha gena yaddi mese nihandawa bala sitinne thama usaswim pilibandawa athi gijukama nisada?
